entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 5 this morning then steady. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 5 this morning then steady. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 14 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 11 February 2023
